DIR-657A1(Linux version) Firmware Release Note

svn co svn://172.21.49.143/UBICOM/IP8K/branch/ubicom-distro_SDK_2.0
svn co svn://172.21.49.143/UBICOM/IP8K/trunk/ubicom-distro_SDK_2.0/uClinux

Firmware Version: 1.01b15
Firmware Date: 18, Jan, 2012
Hardware: A1
KERNEL: 2.6.28
SDK: 2.0, Build: 0019, Date: Thu, 22, Sep, 2011
CheckSum: 0x583482AC 
SVN: 2046
a. IPv6 : 1.17R_20111019
b. branch to the latest(2170)
c. uClinux base on v1.01b13(2046)
d. Patch pure.c cmobasicapi.c nvram.default
e. svn up -r 2170  wireless.asp setup_wizard.asp do_wps.asp wizard_wlan2.asp setup_wizard_tmp.asp adv_wps_setting.asp 
e. svn up -r 2170 \uClinux\user\rc\wlan\Atheros\wlan.c

svn -r 805
svn up -r 1698 vendors/sxuptp; \
svn up -r 1809 vendors/ath_wlan_v730407; \
svn up -r 1401 vendors/Ubicom_StreamEngine2; \
svn up -r 947  linux-2.6.x/arch/ubicom32/AR8316/athrs16_phy.c; \
svn up -r 1013 linux-2.6.x/arch/ubicom32/mach-common/AR8316/athrs16_phy.c; \
svn up -r 959  linux-2.6.x/kernel/sysctl.c; \
svn up -r 976  linux-2.6.x/fs/open.c; \
svn up -r 1185 linux-2.6.x/fs/namei.c; \
svn up -r 976  linux-2.6.x/include/asm-generic/fcntl.h; \
svn up -r 1309 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/igmp.c; \
svn up -r 1334 linux-2.6.x/drivers/net/ubi32_eth.c; \
svn up -r 1525 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/tcp_ipv4.c; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/include/linux/netfilter/nf_conntrack_rtsp.h; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/include/linux/netfilter/netfilter_helpers.h; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/include/linux/netfilter/netfilter_mime.h; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/netfilter/Makefile; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/netfilter/Kconfig; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/netfilter/nf_conntrack_rtsp.c; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/netfilter/Kconfig; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/netfilter/Makefile; \
svn up -r 1534 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/netfilter/nf_nat_rtsp.c; \
svn up -r 1846 linux-2.6.x/net/ipv4/netfilter/ipt_PORTTRIGGER.c; \
svn up -r 1846 linux-2.6.x/net/netfilter/nf_conntrack_core.c; \
svn up -r 1167 u-boot/httpd/fsdata.c; \
svn up -r 1559 Makefile; \
svn up uClinux;
